dcterms:description: Dataset refers to the optimal strategy under parameters mis-specification and the cross moving average strategy, assessing the feasibility of forecasting trends modeled by an unobserved mean-reverting diffusion.
dcterms:title: Optimal Strategy under Parameters Mis-specification

dcterms:creator: Ahmed Bel Hadj Ayed

dcterms:description: Dataset refers to the optimal strategy under partial information, analyzing the performance of the optimal strategy when the trend is modeled by an unobserved mean-reverting diffusion.
dcterms:title: Optimal Strategy under Partial Information

dcterms:description: Dataset compares technical analysis methods to mathematical models under parameters mis-specification, providing insights into their performance in financial markets.
dcterms:title: Technical Analysis Compared to Mathematical Models

dcterms:creator: Yingzi Zhu
Guofu Zhou
dcterms:description: Dataset provides an asset allocation perspective on the use of moving averages in technical analysis, analyzing their effectiveness in financial decision-making.
dcterms:title: Technical Analysis: An Asset Allocation Perspective
